JobTitle: Recruiting Operations Manager - Employment Brand, Events and Talent Insights
JobFullDesc: Facebook’s Recruiting Operations Team is seeking an experienced people and program Manager to lead employment brand and talent insights initiatives. In this role, you'll promote Facebook as a great place to work and authentically communicate our unique culture to diverse audiences. You'll be responsible for leading the team, the development and activation of numerous brands and programs, and will work with stakeholders including Diversity & Inclusion, Consumer Marketing, Employment Brand, Recruiting Events, Communications, Recruiting, Referrals, and more. Will focus on building a scaled approach to analyzing talent intelligence, unlocking strategic differentiation and recruiting team effectiveness. To be successful in this role, you have the ability to manage multiple projects concurrently (at both a high level and a very detailed level), and enjoy a fast-moving organization. You’ll possess an artistic eye and value the importance of protecting creative integrity while maintaining a logical outlook for project execution. You thrive within cross-functional teams, excel at building and managing relationships with internal partners and stakeholders, and exhibit excellent organizational skills. Your passion for smart and creative ideas, along with your resourcefulness will be a great addition to the team.
